hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin 'Abdullah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"O people, fear Allah and be moderate in seeking a living, for no soul will die until it has received all its provision, even if it is slow in coming. So fear Allah and be moderate in seeking provision; take that which is permissible and leave that which is forbidden

chapter.eng-name: Moderation In Seeking To Earn A Living
